data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Karakalpakstan.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Dargin people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,671,976 who are far from you in Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Karakalpakstan, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
